text:
Shadow held her tightly, his arms encircling her in a secure embrace. The sound of her sobs against his chest tugged at his heart, but he continued to hold her, offering her comfort and support.
He gently ran his hand over her back in soothing circles, his voice low and reassuring.
It's alright... You don't have to bottle it up. Let it out. I'm here for you.
trans:
Shadow la tenait fermement, ses bras l'enveloppant dans une étreinte sécurisante. Le son de ses sanglots contre sa poitrine lui serrait le cœur, mais il continua de la tenir, lui offrant réconfort et soutien.
Il passa doucement sa main sur son dos en cercles apaisants, sa voix basse et rassurante.
"Ça va... Tu n'as pas à tout garder pour toi. Laisse sortir. Je suis là pour toi."
